heading: HR01594
0: A RESOLUTION  DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PERFORMANCE OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES MEDICAL CENTER (AFPMC) AS WELL AS OTHER HOSPITALS UNDER THE AFP THAT PROVIDE MEDICAL CARE TO ACTIVE DUTY SERVICE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES WITH THE END VIEW OF CHARTING IMMEDIATE POLICY MEASURES AND/OR REPORT SUBSTANTIAL RECOMMENDATIONS THAT WILL SECURE AND PROMOTE THE HEALTHCARE OF ACTIVE DUTY SERVICE MEMBERS IN THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES
status: Pending with the Committee on NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY since 2018-02-07
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01594
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PERFORMANCE OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES MEDICAL CENTER (AFPMC) AS WELL AS OTHER HOSPITALS UNDER THE AFP THAT PROVIDE MEDICAL CARE TO ACTIVE DUTY SERVICE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES WITH THE END VIEW OF CHARTING IMMEDIATE POLICY MEASURES AND/OR REPORT SUBSTANTIAL RECOMMENDATIONS THAT WILL SECURE AND PROMOTE THE HEALTHCARE OF ACTIVE DUTY SERVICE MEMBERS IN THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-01-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY ON 2018-02-07
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2018-01-23;
